reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 679/92: FEE FOR LATE PAYMENT OF FINES
reg_info.reg_name_text: FEE FOR LATE PAYMENT OF FINES

content.section: Fee for late payment of fines
content.content: 1. The administrative fee payable for a fine in default is, (a) $10 for fines imposed after the 12th day of April, 1987 and before the 16th day of December, 1992; (b) $20 for fines imposed on or after the 16th day of December, 1992 and before the 1st day of January, 2016; (c) $40 for fines imposed on or after the 1st day of January, 2016. O. Reg. 350/15, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The administrative fee payable for a fine in default is,

(a) $10 for fines imposed after the 12th day of April, 1987 and before the 16th day of December, 1992;

(b) $20 for fines imposed on or after the 16th day of December, 1992 and before the 1st day of January, 2016;

(c) $40 for fines imposed on or after the 1st day of January, 2016. O. Reg. 350/15, s. 1.

content.section: Fee for late payment of fines
content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 679/92, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 679/92, s. 2.
